tool.name: pRESTO MaskPrimers
tool.description: Removes primers and annotates sequences with primer and barcode identifiers.
tool.command:
ln -s '$fastq_in' in.fastq && ln -s '$primers_in' primers.fasta && MaskPrimers.py '$cc.command' --nproc "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" -s in.fastq -p primers.fasta --mode '$mode' --maxerror '$maxerror' $revpr $barcode
#if $cc.command == "align" --maxlen '$cc.maxlen' --gap '$cc.gap_open' '$cc.gap_extend' $cc.skiprc #end if
#if $cc.command == "score" --start '$cc.start' #end if
--outdir=. --outname=tmp_mask #if $capture_log --log '$log_out' #end if

param.label: Mode
param.help: Specifies how identified primer sequences will be handled.
param.option: Mask primer to Ns and remove preceding sequence (mask)
Leave primer intact and remove preceding sequence (trim)
Leave primer and preceding sequence intact (tag)

param.name: command
param.label: Command
param.option: Find primer matches using pairwise local alignment (align)
Find primer matches by scoring primers at a fixed position (score)

param.label: Max Length
param.help: Maximum length of sequence window to search for primers.

param.label: Skip Reverse Complement
param.help: Skip checking of reverse complement sequences.

param.name: gap_open
param.label: Gap Open Penalty
param.help: Positive value of the gap open penalty.

param.name: gap_extend
param.label: Gap Extension Penalty
param.help: Positive value of the gap extension penalty.

param.label: Start Position
param.help: The starting position of the primer.

param.label: Reverse Match
param.help: Match the reverse complement of primer sequences against the ends of reads.

param.label: Extract Barcodes (UMIs)
param.help: Capture the sequence preceding the primer as a UMI.

param.label: Max Error Rate
param.help: Maximum allowable rate between read and primer sequence.
